title: Robe
description: Outer robe or coat of black satin brocaded in gold with design of hundred boys at play.  Wide sleves finished with white satin cuffs embroidered with floral sprays and some of the Hundred Antiques in knot stitch in shades of blue, pink, red, green, violet, yellow and brown.  Details in couched gold thread.  Lining of thin blue silk.
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
